verses.verse: שִׁ֗יר <S%H7892><s%> Shir, A Song הַֽמַּ֫עֲל֥וֹת <S%H4609><s%> ham-Ma-'a-Lot of degrees רַ֭בַּת <S%H7227><s%> Rab-bat Many a time צְרָר֣וּנִי <S%H6887><s%> tze-ra-Ru-ni have they afflicted מִנְּעוּרַ֑י <S%H5271><s%> min-ne-'u-Rai; me from my youth יֹֽאמַר־ <S%H559><s%> yo-mar- now say נָ֝א <S%H4994><s%> na now יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. may Israel

רַ֭בַּת <S%H7227><s%> Rab-bat Many a time צְרָר֣וּנִי <S%H6887><s%> tze-ra-Ru-ni have they afflicted מִנְּעוּרָ֑י <S%H5271><s%> min-ne-'u-Rai; me from my youth גַּ֝ם <S%H1571><s%> gam Yet לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- have not יָ֥כְלוּ <S%H3201><s%> Ya-che-lu yet they have not prevailed לִֽי׃ Li.

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- upon גַּ֭בִּי <S%H1354><s%> Gab-bi upon my back חָרְשׁ֣וּ <S%H2790><s%> cha-re-Shu The plowers חֹרְשִׁ֑ים <S%H2790><s%> cho-re-Shim; plowed הֶ֝אֱרִ֗יכוּ <S%H748><s%> he-'e-Ri-chu, they made long; לְמַעֲנֹותָם le-ma-'a-no-tam כלְמַעֲנִיתָֽם׃ <S%H4618><s%> le-ma-'a-ni-Tam. furrow ק

יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh The LORD צַדִּ֑יק <S%H6662><s%> tzad-Dik; [is] righteous קִ֝צֵּ֗ץ <S%H7112><s%> kitz-Tzetz, he hath cut asunder עֲב֣וֹת <S%H5688><s%> a-Vot the cords רְשָׁעִֽים׃ <S%H7563><s%> re-sha-'Im. of the wicked

יֵ֭בֹשׁוּ <S%H954><s%> Ye-vo-shu Let them all be confounded וְיִסֹּ֣גוּ <S%H5472><s%> ve-yis-So-gu and turned אָח֑וֹר <S%H268><s%> a-Chor; back כֹּ֝֗ל <S%H3605><s%> Kol, may all שֹׂנְאֵ֥י <S%H8130><s%> so-ne-'Ei that hate צִיּֽוֹן׃ <S%H6726><s%> tzi-Yon. Zion

יִ֭הְיוּ <S%H1961><s%> Yih-yu them be like כַּחֲצִ֣יר <S%H2682><s%> ka-cha-Tzir Let them be as the grass גַּגּ֑וֹת <S%H1406><s%> gag-Got; [upon] the housetops שֶׁקַּדְמַ֖ת <S%H6927><s%> shek-kad-Mat afore שָׁלַ֣ף <S%H8025><s%> sha-Laf it groweth up יָבֵֽשׁ׃ <S%H3001><s%> ya-Vesh. which withereth

שֶׁלֹּ֤א <S%H3808><s%> shel-Lo does not מִלֵּ֖א <S%H4390><s%> mil-Le filleth כַפּ֥וֹ <S%H3709><s%> chap-Po not his hand קוֹצֵ֗ר <S%H7114><s%> ko-Tzer, Wherewith the mower וְחִצְנ֥וֹ <S%H2683><s%> ve-chitz-No his bosom מְעַמֵּֽר׃ <S%H6014><s%> me-'am-Mer. nor he that bindeth sheaves

וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo Nor אָֽמְר֨וּ׀ <S%H559><s%> 'a-me-Ru say הָעֹבְרִ֗ים <S%H5674><s%> ha-'oe-Rim, Neither do they which go by בִּרְכַּֽת־ <S%H1293><s%> bir-kat- The blessing יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אֲלֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-lei-Chem; about בֵּרַ֥כְנוּ <S%H1288><s%> be-Rach-nu [be] upon you we bless אֶ֝תְכֶ֗ם <S%H853><s%> 'et-Chem, בְּשֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> be-Shem you in the name יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. of the LORD
